name: MTLIndirectCommandType
desc: The types of commands that you can encode into the indirect command buffer.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes the set of command types from a raw integer value.

items.name: static var drawPatches: MTLIndirectCommandType
items.desc: A draw call command for tessellated patches.

items.name: static var drawIndexedPatches: MTLIndirectCommandType
items.desc: An indexed draw call command for tessellated patches.

items.name: static var concurrentDispatch: MTLIndirectCommandType
items.desc: A compute command using a grid aligned to threadgroup boundaries.

items.name: static var concurrentDispatchThreads: MTLIndirectCommandType
items.desc: A compute command using an arbitrarily sized grid.
